modulesynopsis.name: mod_echo
modulesynopsis.description: A simple echo server to illustrate protocol modules

summary.p: This module provides an example protocol module to illustrate the concept. It provides a simple echo server. Telnet to it and type stuff, and it will echo it.

directivesynopsis.name: ProtocolEcho
directivesynopsis.description: Turn the echo server on or off
directivesynopsis.compatibility: ProtocolEcho is only available in 2.0 and later.

usage.p: The ProtocolEcho directive enables or disables the echo server.
